entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
